interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Derailed (Theatrical Full Screen) Review Date: 2019/10/04 Store: Jennifer Aniston (Actor), Vincent Cassel (Actor), Mikael Hafstrom (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, All Lionsgate Titles Product Description: ["Advertising executive Charles Schine is just another Chicago commuter who regularly catches the 8:43 A.M. train to work. But the one day he misses his train and meets Lucinda Harris, his life is changed forever. Lucinda is charming, beautiful and seductive. Despite the fact that each are married with children, their attraction to one another is magnetic. Lunch dates quickly become cocktails after work, and before long, Charles and Lucinda's infatuation leads them to a hotel room. Their seemingly perfect affair goes terribly awry when LaRoche, a brutal stranger, breaks into their room and holds them at gunpoint. This once illicit liaison turns into a nightmare more dangerous and violent than either could have ever imagined. Charles' life soon becomes filled with deception, blackmail, violence and crime. Unable to confide in his wife or speak to the police, Charles finds himself trapped in a world he doesn't recognize, with no trace of the life he once knew."] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Thriller', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'Jennifer Aniston, Mikael Hafstrom, Tom Conti, Melissa George, Clive Owen, Lorenzo Bonaventura, RZA, Vincent Cassel, Di Bonaventura Pictures; Miramax Films; Patalex V Productions LimitedJennifer Aniston, Mikael Hafstrom, Tom Conti, Melissa George, Clive Owen, Lorenzo Bonaventura, RZA, Vincent Cassel, Di Bonaventura Pictures; Miramax Films; Patalex V Productions Limited See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.75 x 0.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WENC7862DVD', 'Director': 'Mikael Hafstrom', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 21, 2006', 'Actors': 'Jennifer Aniston, Vincent Cassel, Tom Conti, Melissa George, Clive Owen', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Producers': 'Lorenzo Bonaventura', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Stupid movie
Jennifer Aniston isn't so good just has a name.
Waste if time and money Review Title: Not worth it Rating: 2.0 --------------------------------------------------

Gary Gray (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure ["Now that Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel) and Letty Ortiz (Michelle Rodriguez) are on their honeymoon, and Brian (Paul Walker) and Mia (Jordana Brewster) have retired from the game, and the rest of the crew has been exonerated, the globetrotting team has found a semblance of a normal life. But when a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of crime he can't seem to escape, and a betrayal of those closest to him, they will face trials that will test them as never before. From the shores of Cuba and the streets of New York City to the icy plains off the arctic Barents Sea, the elite force will crisscross the globe to stop an anarchist from unleashing chaos on the world's stage, and to bring home the man who made them a family. —harpreet phamber"] {'Genre': 'Fast & Furious 8, Furious Eight, Fast and Furious 8, DVD Movie, Blu-ray Movie, The Fast and the Furious 8, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Cuba, Fast 8, Fast8, Furious 8, Action & Adventure, Mystery & Suspense, Fast EightFast & Furious 8, Furious Eight, Fast and Furious 8, DVD Movie, Blu-ray Movie, The Fast and the Furious 8, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Cuba, Fast 8, Fast8, Furious 8, Action & Adventure, Mystery & Suspense, Fast Eight See more', 'Format': 'Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Digital_copy, Widescreen', 'Contributor': "F. Moritz, Vin Diesel, Michael Fottrell', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Chris Morgan', 'Number of discs': '1'} Great We got the whole collection Trolls DHD Kendrick, Anna (Actor), Timberlake, Justin (Actor) Rated: PG Format: DVD Movies & TV, Movies ["From the creators of Shrek comes the most smart, funny, irreverent animated comedy of the year, DreamWorks' Trolls. This holiday season, enter a colorful, wondrous world populated by hilariously unforgettable characters and discover the story of the overly optimistic Trolls, with a constant song on their lips, and the comically pessimistic Bergens, who are only happy when they have trolls in their stomach. Featuring original music from Justin Timberlake, and soon-to-be classic mash-ups of songs from other popular artists, the film stars the voice talents of Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake, Russell Brand, James Corden, Kunal Nayyar, Ron Funches, Icona Pop, Gwen Stefani, and many more. DreamWorks' TROLLS is a fresh, broad comedy filled with music, heart and hair-raising adventures. In November of 2016, nothing can prepare you for our new Troll world."] {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '43448706', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, AC-3, Subtitled, Dubbed, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '92 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 7, 2017', 'Actors': 'Kendrick, Anna, Timberlake, Justin, Brand, Russell, Corden, James, Nayyar, Kunal', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'} Such a happy movie we all love watching it Fun and happy moods after Sausage Party Conrad Vernon (Director, Producer), Greg Tiernan (Director) Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles ['In this CG-animated movie, one sausage leads a group of supermarket products on a quest to discover the truth about their existence and what really happens when they become chosen to leave the grocery store. The film features the vocal talents of some of today’s best comedy stars – Seth Rogen, Kristen Wiig, Jonah Hill, Bill Hader, Michael Cera, James Franco, Danny McBride, Craig Robinson, Paul Rudd, Nick Kroll, David Krumholtz, Edward Norton, and Salma Hayek.'] {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, AC-3, Widescreen, Dubbed, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Evan Goldberg, Greg Tiernan, Great Beyond, LLC, Megan Ellison, Seth Rogen, Conrad Vernon', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 29 minutes', 'Digital Copy Expiration Date': 'December 31, 2019', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.3 x 7.5 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '43382325', 'Director': 'Conrad Vernon, Greg Tiernan', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, AC-3, Widescreen, Dubbed, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 29 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 8, 2016', 'Dubbed': 'French', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Producers': 'Conrad Vernon, Evan Goldberg, Megan Ellison, Seth Rogen', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Stupid. ABSOLUTELY NOT FOR MINORS Cake Sam Worthington (Actor), Jennifer Aniston (Actor), Daniel Barnz (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, All Fox Titles ["Claire Simmons (Jennifer Aniston) is in pain. Her physical pain is evident in the scars that line her body and the way she carries herself, wincing with each tentative step. She's no good at hiding her emotional pain either. Blunt to the point of searing insult, Claire's anger seethes out of her with nearly every interaction. She has driven away her husband, her friends - even her chronic-pain support group has kicked her out. The only one left in Claire's otherwise solitary existence is her housekeeper-cum-caretaker, Silvana (Academy Award nominee Adriana Barraza), who barely tolerates her boss' need for liquor and prescription pills. But the suicide of Nina (Academy Award nominee Anna Kendrick), one of Claire's fellow chronic-pain group members, prompts another fixation. In pursuing questions about the death of a woman she barely knew, Claire explores the boundaries between life and death, abandonment and heartbreak, danger and salvation. As she inserts herself into the lives of Nina's husband (Sam Worthington) and the son Nina left behind, Claire just might find salvation."] {'Brand': 'TCFHE', 'Item Weight': '0.1 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Weight': '0.06 Kilograms', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2311542', 'Director': 'Daniel Barnz', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, Widescreen, NTSC, DTS Surround Sound', 'Run time': '1 hour and 42 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 21, 2015', 'Actors': 'Sam Worthington, Jennifer Aniston, Anna Kendrick, Paula Cale, Mamie Gummer', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French, English', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Number of discs': '1'} Doesn't relate to the real thing and people. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to enjoy classic films from the 1980s and 1990s, while exploring contemporary genres, especially animated films. They seek nostalgia-driven content but are increasingly focused on family-friendly options and maintain an openness to diverse genres.

- **Genre Interest:** The user favors classic films, music-related content, animated comedies, and action-adventure narratives. Recent interactions indicate a discerning approach, leading to a cautious stance on adult-themed films that do not resonate with them.

- **Format Choice:** The user maintains a strong preference for DVDs, valuing their collectible nature and enhanced features.

- **Review Style:** Historically providing succinct, positive feedback, the user has shifted toward critical evaluations, particularly highlighting issues with realism and authenticity in content, reflecting a more discerning taste.

- **Actor Affinity:** The user appreciates films featuring recognizable talent, especially in animated content, and demonstrates enthusiasm for well-known actors.

- **Family-Friendly Content:** Although the user enjoys family-friendly selections, their recent feedback reveals a growing awareness of content suitability. They express disappointment with films that are adult-rated yet lack relatability and depth.

This update reflects the user’s ongoing commitment to classic nostalgia while emphasizing a critical approach to content suitability as they navigate between family-friendly viewing and adult themes.
